channel.title: Music on DefinIT
channel.description: Recent content in Music on DefinIT

item.title: My Top Ten albums of all time
item.description: So recently a few folk whom I respect a great deal posted up their top 10 albums of all time, initially I was like, OK, but having gone through the exercise myself I found it really enjoyable. Sure its quite self indulgent but seeing other people’s lists gives you a small glimpse into their life. After all musical taste is a hugely personal thing. I approached my top 10 by considering which bands and albums had the biggest impact on me at a given time in my life and that I still enjoy today.
